Reviews.Title: Great Buy.. would recommend
Reviews.Author: Rohit "Rohit"
Reviews.Content: I got this new-age basic phone for my mom. Windows Phone OS is great to teach to an elderly newbie. I was always confident about OS,as I personally use a Lumia phone. Hardware and performance is what has surprised me. Extermely satisfied with it. Speakers are great. Flash light is missing but I didn't see issue when clicking lowlight indoor snaps. Screen could have been better but won't crib about it given that the price of phone is this less.Phone was unlocked as said.

Reviews.Title: Not unlocked
Reviews.Author: haffiz o momodu
Reviews.Content: The phone was not unlocked as stated on the site. I bought this phone because I needed it unlocked for immediate usage on another phone network other than AT&T.; Apparently; the depicted impression on the Amazon site was not factual. Resulting in my time being wasted and money tied down. As such I have to buy another phone from a different website.

Reviews.Title: very good phone
Reviews.Author: Sadie Tucker
Reviews.Content: it is a AWESOME phone but i bought it for my 10year old, and he needed a little help.  it has a amazing camera.

Reviews.Title: have no problems with it
Reviews.Author: martin
Reviews.Content: have been using phone for a week now and for-sure l love. Battery doesn't drain fast and  camera is awesome

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: Vinod Sekhar
Reviews.Content: I got bored with IOS and moved to Windows Phone. Win OS is great and use and feel is great.Great battery back-up and big screen. Speed is also great.

Reviews.Title: Loved this cell Phone!
Reviews.Author: David Fike
Reviews.Content: I think for the price this is a great deal and it is a great cell phone Ive had no problems with it at all. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: k Niranjan reddy
Reviews.Content: Excellent and good smart phone at this price. It  is better than other andriod smart phones. Specifications given for this price is awesome

Reviews.Title: Pretty phone!!
Reviews.Author: Erhong M.
Reviews.Content: I like this red phone and window 8. The screen size is neither small or big; It has not too many functions, but for me, it's enough.

Reviews.Title: I <3 my new Lumia 520
Reviews.Author: Hugo
Reviews.Content: Just awesomeIt is an excellent device for a good price.The operating system is extremely fluid and beautiful :3

Reviews.Title: Fully recommended 100%
Reviews.Author: Valentine Erondu
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed using this phone. For the price, I cant believe it is doing such marvelous things and leaving me with a lasting experience. i recommend it 100%

Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz
Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 Mhz
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia Lumia 520 Red 8GB Unlocked GSM Windows 8 OS Cell Phone
